Damkar Jakut: Api di Gedung Hailai Sudah Padam, Sedang Proses Pendinginan
05 Nov 2019, 07:51 by Indra Komara
Jakarta - Si jago merah yang melalap Gedung Hailai, Ancol, Jakarta Utara, akhirnya sudah padam. Saat ini masih dilakukan proses pendinginan.
"Api padam pukul 03.00 WIB. Sekarang dalam proses pendinginan," kata Kasudin Gulkarmat Jakarta Utara Satriadi Gunawan, saat dikonfirmasi, Selasa (5/11/2019).
Menurut dia, tidak ada korban akibat kebakaran tersebut. Penyebab kebakaran masih dilakukan penyelidikan, termasuk total kerugian.
"Penyebab dan kerugian masih di selidiki," ujarnya.
Sebelumnya, kebakaran di Gedung Hailai terjadi pada Selasa (4/11) malam pukul 22.50 WIB. Api cepat menyambar hampir ke seluruh bangunan gedung.
Sekretaris Kampung Siaga Bencana (KSB) Ancol, Amar menjelaskan, api dengan cepat melalap Gedung Hailai diduga karena angin kencang dan material mudah terbakar yang ada di dalam gedung. Amar mengatakan, gedung tersebut sudah dalam tahap proses pembongkaran.
"Jadi saat ini sedang ada tahap pembongkaran oleh kontraktor yang bongkar, jadi konstruksi ada proses pengelasan. Kalau sumber api diduga dari hasil pekerjaan las itu. Cuma waktu kejadian sudah tidak ada waktu pengerjaan, pengerjaan berhenti pukul 17.00 WIB. Jadi ini kayaknya sisa besi masih panas, terus di bawah juga banyak material busa, kayak busa sofa, jadi mungkin angin juga agak kenceng jadi tiba-tiba besar (api)," jelas Amar saat dihubungi terpisah.

North Jakarta Damkar: The Fire in the Hailai Building Has Extinguished, While the Cooling Process
05 Nov 2019, 07:51 by Indra Komara
Jakarta - The red rooster that engulfed the Hailai Building, Ancol, North Jakarta, has finally been extinguished. Currently the cooling process is still being carried out.
"The fire went out at 3:00 a.m. It is now in the process of cooling," said Kasudin Gulkarmat North Jakarta Satriadi Gunawan, when confirmed, Tuesday (11/5/2019).
According to him, there were no casualties from the fire. The cause of the fire is still being investigated, including the total loss.
"The causes and losses are still being investigated," he said.
Previously, a fire at the Hailai Building occurred on Tuesday (11/4) night at 22.50 WIB. The fire quickly grabbed almost the entire building.
The Secretary of the Ancol Disaster Preparedness Village (KSB), Amar explained, the fire quickly engulfed the Hailai Building, allegedly due to strong winds and flammable materials inside the building. Amar said the building was in the demolition stage.
"So there is currently a demolition stage by the contractor who is unloading, so the construction is in the process of welding. If the source of the fire is suspected from the results of the welding work. Only when the incident happened there was no time to work, the work stopped at 17.00 WIB. So this seems like the remaining iron remains heat, then under a lot of foam material, like foam sofa, so maybe the wind is a bit too thick so suddenly it is big (fire), "explained Amar when contacted separately.
